## IStyleable interface

Interface for an object that a style can be added to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IStyleable 
```

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

[addStyle(style)](./blockly.istyleable_interface.addstyle_1_methodsignature.md)

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[removeStyle(style)](./blockly.istyleable_interface.removestyle_1_methodsignature.md)
